method.text: Beat the egg whites, with the lemon juice and sugar until stiff peak stage
Beat one third of the egg white into the hot melted chocolate. This needs to be done quickly and while the chocolate is hot, otherwise the chocolate will seize
Add the chocolate mix back into the remaining egg white mix and fold together until combined
Divide into individual dishes if you ish, and chill in the fridge for a few hours

notes.text: Try with raw brown sugar next time (not sure if it will produce a stable foam with the egg whites)
Can add vanilla to this also
